price: “Momma ohiani biara nnwura (afuo yi) mu mma mo ha nnε “.
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
